name: Ranger K-21
description:
Ranger K-21

A space adventure in a 3D environment. Embark on your powerful ship and navigate through an abandoned Motherbase to complete your crucial mission. 

Installation Instructions: Download, Unzip and execute game.

Authors: Yeray Bartolomé, Álvaro de Pablos, Miguel Carrasco, Roger Rodriguez, Álvaro Vidal.
